update tb_customer set wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_photo = #{headPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_delivery_point = #{defaultDeliveryPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_bind_phone = #{isBindPhone,jdbcType=BIT}, regiest_time = #{regiestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, first_order_time = #{firstOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_order_shop = #{lastOrderShop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_notice_time = #{newNoticeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, share_customer = #{shareCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_now_register = #{isNowRegister}, customer_detail_id = #{customerDetailId}, bind_phone_time = #{bindPhoneTime}, bind_phone_shop = #{bindPhoneShop}, real_time_coupon_ids = #{realTimeCouponIds}, subscribe = #{subscribe}, last_table_number = #{lastTableNumber}, birthday_coupon_ids = #{birthdayCouponIds}, share_coupon_ids = #{shareCouponIds}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from tb_customer
select * from tb_customer where wechat_id=#{0}
SELECT id,nickname,telephone from tb_customer where id=#{customerId}
select wechat_id ,nickname,telephone from tb_customer where brand_id=#{brandId}
select telephone from tb_customer where telephone is not null
select * from tb_customer where telephone=#{0}
mapper.update: update tb_customer set last_order_shop = #{0} where id=#{1}
update tb_customer set new_notice_time=now() where id=#{0}
update tb_customer set first_order_time=now() where id=#{0}
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_customer where id = #{0} and telephone is null

SELECT id,wechat_id,nickname,telephone,head_photo,is_bind_phone,regiest_time, first_order_time,last_login_time,account_id,brand_id,sex,province,city,country,last_order_shop,subscribe,last_table_number FROM tb_customer WHERE is_bind_phone = 1 AND regiest_time >= #{beginDate} and regiest_time <= #{endDate} AND brand_id=#{brandId}
select tc.id,tc.nickname,tc.telephone,tc.account_id,IFNULL(ta.remain,0) remain from tb_customer tc left join tb_account ta on tc.account_id = ta.id where tc.telephone = #{telephone}
SELECT count(1) FROM tb_customer WHERE share_customer = #{id}

SELECT tc.id,tc.is_bind_phone,tc.nickname,tc.birthday_coupon_ids,tc.wechat_id,tcd.birth_date,tcd.shop_detail_id FROM tb_customer tc INNER JOIN tb_customer_detail tcd ON tc.customer_detail_id = tcd.id WHERE tcd.birth_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tc.id DESC LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(tc.id) FROM tb_customer tc INNER JOIN tb_customer_detail tcd ON tc.customer_detail_id = tcd.id WHERE tcd.birth_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM tb_customer WHERE telephone=#{telePhone}
SELECT * FROM tb_customer WHERE serial_number = #{number}
select * from tb_customer limit 1

select t.id,wechat_id,telephone,t2.id as orderId,t2.shop_detail_id as shopDetailId from tb_customer t left join tb_order t2 on t2.customer_id = t.id where order_state in (2,10) and production_status in (2,3,4) and allow_appraise = 1
and (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t2.create_time))/(60*60*24) > #{time} and t2.create_time >= CONCAT(#{startTime},'00:00:00') and wechat_id != '0'
GROUP BY wechat_id
select * from tb_customer where share_customer = #{customerId} order by bind_phone_time desc LIMIT #{currentPage},#{showCount}
select * from tb_customer where account_id = #{accountId}
select id from tb_customer where union_id = #{unionId}
select id,telephone,is_bind_phone,union_id from tb_customer where union_id = #{unionId} and id != #{customerId}
